content: I signed up for a PSET buddy for PSET2, but wasn't assigned one. The same thing happened to me last week. I know I submitted the PSET buddy form. Is it possible to get someone assigned?
subject: PSET 2 Buddy Needed

content: I'll assign you to a group of 3 via email. Not sure why you were not assigned one...

@Matthew Feng she filled out her preferences. kerb: dlinda

Any idea why she wasn't assigned?
I think we have to do another export of the enrolled students CSV from Canvas – she's not in the current copy, which is used by the script to get current students.
Gotcha, I'll email you the updated csv!
Thanks, I will be looking out for your email!
